response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and aspirations, is priced at $1,200,000. My aim is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, so I am confident that this offer will be attractive to you. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
